snippet: Despite an advisory group’s recommendation to vote against most of Target’s board, all of its members were re-elected, according to preliminary voting.
abstract: Attendance at Target's annual shareholder meeting is sparse and few questions are asked, in stark contrast to company's exceptionally tumultuous year.
lead_paragraph: Despite an advisory group’s recommendation to vote against most of Target’s board, all of its members were re-elected, according to preliminary voting.

headline.main: Target Seeks to Reassure Its Investors at Meeting
headline.print_headline: Target Seeks to Reassure Its Investors at Meeting
